title: Vel'koz E Interaction With Yasuo WW
body:
Vel'koz's E goes through the wall. The animation gets removed but the knockup and damage still go through. This is UNINTENDED as stated by a rioter in this post from 10 months ago.
http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/c/bugs/EEqgkcKV-champion-abilities-velkoz-interactions-with-yasous-wind-wall?comment=0002
Rito pls fix

EDIT: For those saying his E isn't a projectile...
1:18 of this video. There's clearly small purple beams coming out of his tentacles showing how long it will be until the projectile lands causing the knockup. It's a projectile clearly.

replies.body:
Just because there is something coming from his tentacles does not mean that the ability is a projectile. It's a targeted AoE with a knockup. But if he were to just gesture in a random direction and all of a sudden you were being knocked up, there would be no counterplay. You wouldn't know where exactly it was going to happen or how long you had until it did. Riot adds in a particle effect so that enemies have the opportunity to visibly be aware that the knockup is coming and take steps to prevent it, whether it be a timely flash, a blink, dash ability, or just right clicking in another direction.

Yasuo's wall already blocks well over half of what is available in the game. It's safe to say it gives him more than enough as is considering he can cast it for free. Sounds like someone just got wrecked by a VelKoz and isn't too happy about it.

>wanting windwall to block even more spells

nice meme

Lol, rito fix something that is actually a problem? 
But yes plz fix it, make the animation go through as well.

> Lol, rito fix something that is actually a problem? 
> But yes plz fix it, make the animation go through as well.

But its a projectile and should be blocked. The animation should be REMOVED as well as the damage/knockup
Yes, remove the animation so that even more people can then post more QQ threads about how annoying it is that they have no idea when he's about to use it. Good plan.
how is Vel'koz's knock back a projectile? i would understand if the Q or W was blocked, but the E is the least projectile-y (< apparently, that is in fact a word) of his abilities
So you want yasuo's windwall to be more ridiculous than it already is? Just make the animation go through as well and we're done.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mHC_nD_tBvE
1:18 of this video. There's clearly small purple beams coming out of his tentacles showing how long it will be until the projectile lands causing the knockup. It's a projectile clearly.
